title: How to Practice Good Feeling Thoughts to Attract Your Desires
description:
There’s one extremely important method to master if you want to manifest your desires. It’s the power of positive thoughts! In this episode of Dear Gabby, get ready to amp up your manifesting power! You’ll learn how practicing good-feeling thoughts helps you receive the direction you need to attract more of what you want. Get psyched to tap into your own inner guidance system.

Get ready to learn how to lean into a positive perspective, how to lean into a solution, and how to lean into what's working. 

Throughout this episode I’ll reveal:

  • How to unapologetically claim your desires

  • How thoughts become things 

  • A prayer to help you open up to receiving important messages

  • 3 steps to stop playing small

  • My method for listening to the gentle voice of your true inner guidance

  • The importance of resilience in every moment

  • Why when we lean in to the experience of fun, we can't fail

No matter how much you're struggling, no matter how much you've detoured in the wrong direction, this show can be your catalyst for a quantum shift. 

Put on Dear Gabby and let’s practice good-feeling thoughts together! And when you’re finished listening, I welcome you to leave a review. Let me know how it's going. Share your good-feeling thoughts and your miracles.

RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode. 

 

Listen to more Dear Gabby here: www.deargabby.com 

 

MEDITATION CHALLENGE

On August 1 I start my 21-day Meditation Challenge for anyone who wants to calm anxiety, feel awesome and elevate every area of their life! When you join the Meditation Challenge you’ll get: 

 

  • 21 daily meditations (a different style each day) 
  • Exclusive member platform and journal 
  • Daily emails to keep you on track (plus text support if you want it) 
  • Community support (literally the coolest group ever!) 
  • A live training session with me on Day 21! 

 

Click here to join! https://bit.ly/3dT1toq

 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP:

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join https://bit.ly/3zsaQ7T



BOOKS & CARDS

  • Super Attractor book https://bit.ly/3wuzm6w

  • Super Attractor card deck https://bit.ly/3iLGrf0

  • The Universe Has Your Back https://bit.ly/3gpP4Kq

  • Judgment Detox https://bit.ly/3gymLZm



MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES

  • Safety, Recovery and Mental Health Resources https://bit.ly/3gou4Up

 

  • Mental Health Resources and My Story of Recovery from Postpartum Anxiety and Depression  https://bit.ly/3wvBTgP

 

 

PARTNERS

We've worked out an exclusive offer with Hiya for their best selling children's vitamin. Dear Gabby listeners receive 50% off your first order. To claim this deal go to hiyahealth.com/GABBY or enter code GABBY at checkout.

 

Show your skin you care with the Athena Club Razor Kit! Sign up today and you’ll get 20% off your first order! Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code deargabby.

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Produced by Dear Media.
